name: scary-face
effect: Lowers the target’s Speed by two stages.
short_effect: Lowers the target’s Speed by two stages.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user frightens the target with a scary face to harshly lower its Speed stat.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user frightens the target with a scary face to harshly lower its Speed stat.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user frightens the target with a scary face to harshly lower its Speed stat.
